name: Me Llamo Art Charity Auction Day 3. "New Horizons"

metadata.name: Ethereal Dance #1/7
metadata.description:
There are moments in this life that are beyond words. Where beauty is unmatched, and the heart is stirred. In Iceland, under a full moon and October sky, a landscape of glacier ice shone vividly stretched out on the horizon as a swirling, rhythmic wave of light painted the night overhead. 

Spellbound and captivated, I sat on the shoreline taking in the ethereal dance. My first international Northern Light experience and the arctic dream I’ve been longing for finally realized.

This image was captured in a single frame and now serves as a personal reminder of how powerful these emotional connections we experience within nature can be. Moments that remain etched in our memories and our dreams, compelling us to chase that “feeling” time and time again.

Artist: Jenna Dixon
